languages.text: {n}Тело его сотрясают конвульсии, суставы выворачиваются под неестественными углами со звоном лопающихся стальных шарниров. Одержимый бьется в корчах, и внутренние аугменты понемногу проступают сквозь повисающую лохмотьями плоть — словно спрятанный внутри техножреца железный гомункул пытается скинуть кокон из ненужного мяса.{/n}

{n}His body convulses. His joints twist at unnatural angles with the sound of bursting steel couplings. As the possessed man thrashes about, his internal augmetics emerge gradually through the hanging tatters of his flesh, as though an iron homunculus hidden inside the Tech-Priest were trying to cast off the meat cocoon it no longer needed.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Тело его сотрясают конвульсии, суставы выворачиваются под неестественными углами со звоном лопающихся стальных шарниров. Одержимый бьется в корчах, и внутренние аугменты понемногу проступают сквозь повисающую лохмотьями плоть — словно спрятанный внутри техножреца железный гомункул пытается скинуть кокон из ненужного мяса.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sein Körper zuckt. Seine Gelenke verbiegen sich in unnatürlichen Winkeln, begleitet von dem Geräusch brechender Stahlkupplungen. Während der Besessene wild um sich schlägt, tauchen langsam seine internen Augmentationen zwischen den Fetzen seines Fleisch auf. Es wirkt, als wäre ein eiserner Homunculus im Techpriester verborgen und würde nun versuchen, den Fleischkokon abzuschütteln, den er nicht länger benötigt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His body convulses. His joints twist at unnatural angles with the sound of bursting steel couplings. As the possessed man thrashes about, his internal augmetics emerge gradually through the hanging tatters of his flesh, as though an iron homunculus hidden inside the Tech-Priest were trying to cast off the meat cocoon it no longer needed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sein Körper zuckt. Seine Gelenke verbiegen sich in unnatürlichen Winkeln, begleitet von dem Geräusch brechender Stahlkupplungen. Während der Besessene wild um sich schlägt, tauchen langsam seine internen Augmentationen zwischen den Fetzen seines Fleisch auf. Es wirkt, als wäre ein eiserner Homunculus im Techpriester verborgen und würde nun versuchen, den Fleischkokon abzuschütteln, den er nicht länger benötigt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Son corps est pris de convulsions, Ses articulations se tordent en prenant des angles tout sauf naturels dans un bruit d'acier tonitruant. Alors que l'homme possédé se débat, ses augmétiques internes ressortent peu à peu à travers ses chairs, comme si un Hémoncule de fer, caché à l'intérieur du technoprêtre, tentait de rejeter l'enveloppe de chair dont elle n'avait plus besoin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His body convulses. His joints twist at unnatural angles with the sound of bursting steel couplings. As the possessed man thrashes about, his internal augmetics emerge gradually through the hanging tatters of his flesh, as though an iron homunculus hidden inside the Tech-Priest were trying to cast off the meat cocoon it no longer needed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Son corps est pris de convulsions, Ses articulations se tordent en prenant des angles tout sauf naturels dans un bruit d'acier tonitruant. Alors que l'homme possédé se débat, ses augmétiques internes ressortent peu à peu à travers ses chairs, comme si un Hémoncule de fer, caché à l'intérieur du technoprêtre, tentait de rejeter l'enveloppe de chair dont elle n'avait plus besoin.{/n}

languages.text: {n}他的身体剧烈抽搐，关节扭曲到不合常理的角度，钢铸链接处发出断裂的声响。被附身的技术神甫疯狂地挣扎着，他体内的植入物也逐渐从他血肉的碎片中脱落出来，仿佛某个隐藏在他体内的小铁人，正打算从这具肉茧中挣脱出来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His body convulses. His joints twist at unnatural angles with the sound of bursting steel couplings. As the possessed man thrashes about, his internal augmetics emerge gradually through the hanging tatters of his flesh, as though an iron homunculus hidden inside the Tech-Priest were trying to cast off the meat cocoon it no longer needed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他的身体剧烈抽搐，关节扭曲到不合常理的角度，钢铸链接处发出断裂的声响。被附身的技术祭司疯狂地挣扎着，他体内的植入物也逐渐从他血肉的碎片中脱落出来，仿佛某个隐藏在他体内的小铁人，正打算从这具肉茧中挣脱出来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}男の体がビクビクと震える。関節は不自然な方向にねじれ、鋼の結合部分がバキバキと音を立てた。はりつけになった男が体をばたつかせることで、体内のオーグメティックが肉体に引っかかっているぼろきれ越しにどんどん露わになっていく。その姿は、さながら技術司祭の中に隠れた鉄のホムンクルスが、不要になった肉の繭を捨て去ろうとしているかのようだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His body convulses. His joints twist at unnatural angles with the sound of bursting steel couplings. As the possessed man thrashes about, his internal augmetics emerge gradually through the hanging tatters of his flesh, as though an iron homunculus hidden inside the Tech-Priest were trying to cast off the meat cocoon it no longer needed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}男の体がビクビクと震える。関節は不自然な方向にねじれて、鋼の結合部分がバキバキと音を立てた。張り付けられた男が体をばたつかせると、体内のオーグメティックが肉体にぶら下がったボロ着越しにどんどん露わになる。その姿はまるで、技術司祭の中に隠れた鉄のホムンクルスが、必要なくなった肉の繭を捨て去ろうとしているようだった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Su cuerpo convulsiona. Sus articulaciones se retuercen en ángulos antinaturales con el sonido de acoplamientos de acero que estallan. A medida que el hombre poseído se agita, sus auméticos internos emergen gradualmente a través de los jirones colgantes de su carne, como si un homúnculo de hierro oculto en el interior del Tecnosacerdote intentara desprenderse del capullo de carne que ya no necesita.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His body convulses. His joints twist at unnatural angles with the sound of bursting steel couplings. As the possessed man thrashes about, his internal augmetics emerge gradually through the hanging tatters of his flesh, as though an iron homunculus hidden inside the Tech-Priest were trying to cast off the meat cocoon it no longer needed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Su cuerpo convulsiona. Sus articulaciones se retuercen en ángulos antinaturales con el sonido de acoplamientos de acero que estallan. A medida que el hombre poseído se agita, sus auméticos internos emergen gradualmente a través de los jirones colgantes de su carne, como si un homúnculo de hierro oculto en el interior del Tecnosacerdote intentara desprenderse del capullo de carne que ya no necesita.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vücudu kasılıyor. Eklemleri anormal açılarda bükülürken demir bağlantılarından çatırtılar yükseliyor. Ele geçirilen adam kıvranırken iç ogmetikleri, etinin sallanan parçaları arasından yavaş yavaş kendilerini gösteriyor. Sanki Tekno Rahip'in içindeki demirden bir fetüs, artık ihtiyaç duymadığı etten kozasından sıyrılmaya çabalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His body convulses. His joints twist at unnatural angles with the sound of bursting steel couplings. As the possessed man thrashes about, his internal augmetics emerge gradually through the hanging tatters of his flesh, as though an iron homunculus hidden inside the Tech-Priest were trying to cast off the meat cocoon it no longer needed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vücudu kasılıyor. Eklemleri anormal açılarda bükülürken demir bağlantılarından sesler yükseliyor. Ele geçirilen adam kıvranırken iç ogmetikleri, etinin sallanan parçaları arasından kendilerini gösteriyor. Sanki... Tekno Rahip'in içindeki demir homunkulus, artık ihtiyaç duymadığı etten kozasından sıyrılmaya çalışıyor.{/n}
